title: Email
body: I linked my account to a email that I deleted a month ago and now my account got hacked, so is there a way to change my email without having to verify it. Because like I said I deleted that email so theres no way to verify.

replies.body: We can help!  Fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team can help update your email info as well as restore access.  We'll see you there!
